keyMoments.title: Akainu's Psychological Warfare
keyMoments.description: Admiral Akainu uses psychological manipulation tactics on behalf of the Marines to prevent the pirates' escape.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the Marines' ruthless approach to eliminating pirate threats.

keyMoments.title: Marines Witness Ace's Fall
keyMoments.description: Marine forces witness Admiral Akainu deliver a fatal blow to Portgas D. Ace.
keyMoments.significance: A major victory for the Marines in eliminating the Pirate King's son.
